text:
My second time here!
The staff are friendly and attentive, even when the kitchen is very busy with non-stop dine-in, take-out, and delivery orders. The wait time for food was reasonable—around 10 to 15 minutes. It’s usually full.

The food is reasonably priced, with large portions and authentic, rich flavors. One dish is enough for two people. We had Clear Tom Yum Soup and a Small Crispy Omelette (recommended), both of which were very generous for two people to share.
These much food for 7 of us! Authentic Thai food. Come early or make a reservation to ensure you gat a table. There are roadside parking which is some walking distance away.

I've been here a few times since the Covid days, and the food was always so good! Today, I brought a few colleagues because I missed the food, but I was disappointed to find that the standard has dropped. The minced meat was too salty and not spicy, the kang kong was not spicy, and the tom yum was more sour than flavorful. However, the pork and desserts were still good.
The restaurant provides decent food and is also very clean. Just a few minutes walk from Pasir Panjang MRT station. Highly recommended. I loved the chicken wing!

Came here to celebrate the passing of mum's (really tough) real estate exam. Amazing wide spread of dishes with excellent quality. Desert we mango sticky rice and red ruby) was marvellous. Service was outstanding with a cozy nostalgic atmosphere. 110% satisfied with Esarn Thai Corner Pair Panjang and will definitely recommend to friends!
